SSQ this is a result of the fix for bug 177858.

Created an attachment (id=61389)
fix to accomodate short tabs
Patch seems to contain a System.out statement
On OS X this was causing Eclipse to crash.  CTabFolder in the dialog was empty except for the tabs and the dialog buttons had a white background.

(In reply to comment #4)
> Patch seems to contain a System.out statement

You weren't supposed to notice that :)
The System.out wasn't applied (the only changes applied were to CTabItem)
